content: 5.5/16 Powder cartridges (.22 caliber) Propellant cartridges for use with the DX E72 powder actuated tool ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti DX range of high-performance, reliable and versatile powder actuated fastening solutions Hilti cartridges are designed specifically for use with Hilti powder actuated tools as part of a matched-tolerance system Applications For use with the DX E72 single-shot nailer for fastenings to steel and concrete For use with the DX E72 nailer ### TECHNICAL DATA: Cartridge type: 5.5/16 NC Approvals: CE, CIP, PTB Cartridge strip capacity: 1 Technical Data | For use with (tools) | DX E37, DX E72 | Cartridge type | 5.5/16 NC | Approvals | CE, CIP, PTB | Cartridge strip capacity | 1 | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 50396 - Cartridge 5.6/16 .22 cal brown - Package Size 100 pc - 50397 - Cartridge 5.6/16 .22 cal green - Package Size 100 pc - 50398 - Cartridge 5.6/16 .22 cal yellow - Package Size 100 pc
